channel.title: [Req.] Homepage
channel.description:
hi, i am looking for somone to design me a homepage for my new subdomain service.
[b][sub]the layout[/sub][/b] Homepage [img]http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/6982/homefj4.gif[/img]
Create New [img]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/8048/createnewds2.gif[/img]
and the contact one i think i can do myself.
i want it so when you submit the new website url, it submits it into an admin area were i can just open it up and get it all, but if you cant do that, can you get it so it sends that info to my email. the email is rs-server@hotmail.co.uk and on one of the ads part you can put one of your ads if you want. and if you want can you make the theme kind of rs but still kind of professional? and can you add my msn the.tom@live.co.uk

item.title: [Req.] Homepage
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:8, topic:168836”][center]Heyy error.login
I’ve finished your site just nowww.
A live preview can be found here!

[hr]

Features;

[ul][li]Clean graphics, a few nice transparencies.[/li]
[li]Easy to mod text areas, full homepage, contact page, and create page.[/li]
[li]Create page contains emailform to submit requests and signup.[/li]
[li]Valid CSS.[/li][/ul]

Problems;

[ul][li]PHP for emailform may not function correctly.[/li][/ul]

[hr]

If you have any questions or would like me to change anything, please say so.
You need to get someone to take a look at, or to remake the PHP file for the email form.

You can download all the files here (.ZIP)

[hr]

-JV
[/center][/quote]
cool ty i just made a tempery one check it out well i used a WYSIWYG editor.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req.] Homepage

item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:6, topic:168836”]Okay then. I’ll get started on that tomorrow.
Is there any more specifics I should know about?

Colour scheme etc?[/quote]
ok erm color scemes blue mabe? and i got it working here is a preview of what your url will be
http://test01.rs-server.biz/
and btw if you can make it vista themed that was be cool. oh and i might add just a little ad on there sites, not sure though.

oh yeah and i am just going to make a temp page k

item.title: [Req.] Homepage
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[center]So, to make things clear;

You want us to create a professional looking website, with text that you can mod. it needs to include a homepage, contact page, and a create page. The create page needs to contain a form that sends you the details of their site, the domain they want, so that you can manually set up their subdomain.

&

The subdomain is;
http://yournamehere.rs-server.biz

?

-JV[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: [Req.] Homepage
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:2, topic:168836”]I’m glad to see you’ve put some thought into this topic. Alot of people who need websites don’t.

I’m interested in this sevice you’re providing. What will the url of the sub-domain actually be?

I’m going to work soon, but I might be able to have a go at it tomorrow.

On the create page, do you need us to create a script which automatically signs a user up, and instantly redirects their URL, or have you got all of that sorted?

-JV[/quote]
i forgot the url lol its http://rs-server.biz/

and nope i was going to manage that manualy but if you could do that, that would be great

Read full topic

item.title: [Req.] Homepage
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

I’m glad to see you’ve put some thought into this topic. Alot of people who need websites don’t.

I’m interested in this sevice you’re providing. What will the url of the sub-domain actually be?

I’m going to work soon, but I might be able to have a go at it tomorrow.

On the create page, do you need us to create a script which automatically signs a user up, and instantly redirects their URL, or have you got all of that sorted?

-JV

EDIT:[b]
Sorry, I’ve just read what you’ve put.
If you want an admin area which does everything automatically, it’s going to be quite a
complex script. =/

I’ll create the site, and I’ll do the e-mail option (create a form which emails their info to you). And if you want to change to the automatic one, you can mod it. :)[/b]

Read full topic
